name: Torarete Tamaruka!?
overview: Based on the film series, the player is part of the Perfect Security Service assigned to protect his client's houses from burglaries. Before each level, the player can purchase tools with what limited money there in the bank account. In the level, the player can use both the available tools and the household traps to intimidate and harm any thieves that get inside. The player is awarded cash for every theft thwarted and penalized for every valuable stolen. The levels become progressively harder with additional and smarter thieves in the gang and more valuables to guard.
